metadata.bio:
1. 롤러코스터 (Roller Coaster) was a Korean indie rock band that included elements of acid jazz in their songs. The band first formed in 1999, that same year they released their debut album Naegero Wa. In 2005 the band did some touring in support of their fourth album Sunsick, including stops in Japan, and England (as part of a Korean Cultural Festival). 
Members: 조원선 (Jo Won-sun) / Lead Vocals, Keyboards, 지누 (Jinu) ~ 2006 / Bass, Programming, 이상순 (Lee Sang-soon) / Guitar 

2. The band RollerCoaster was formed at the begining of XXI century in Rostov-na-Donu,Russia.First time it was a pop-punk band,but after a time and members changes RollerCoaster had become an emo-punk and then emocore band.Rollercoaster can't give a clear definition of genre they play in,because their music combines few different styles.RollerCoaster music was influenced by such bands,as Alexisonfire,From First To Last,The Fall of Troy and etc.
At the end of spring of 2006,band had made a Demo,which consists of 8 songs.

tracks: I can't hide it (숨길 수 없어요)
